endpoints.description: Upload a new dataset for processing and analysis.
Retrieve a summary of the uploaded datasets, including metadata.
Initiate the analytical processing on the selected dataset.
Retrieve the completed analysis results for a specific dataset.
Initiate the training of a predictive model using the uploaded dataset.
Retrieve the current training status of the predictive model.
Retrieve a list of available visualizations for processed datasets.
Customize the dashboard settings to include specific visualizations.
Access the interactive dashboard with configured visualizations and insights.
Set up alerts for key indicators derived from dataset analysis.
